abilities.name: Reactive Shift
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a React Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Delcatty is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Delcatty.
